<<<<<<< HEAD
An exposition of al the principal Scriptures vsed in our English liturgie together with a reason why the church did chuse the same / by Iohn Boys ... Boys, John, 1571-1625.
[6], 126 p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by William Aspley, at the signe of the Parot in Pauls Churchyard, At London : 1610.
Signatures: A⁴(⁻A1) B-R⁴ (last leaf blank). Marginal notes. Error in paging: p. 89 misnumbered 86. Imperfect: copy at reel 1746:16 torn, with slight loss of print. In this edition, title page line 4 begins: PAL. Identified as STC 3456b at reel 587:7. Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 587) and Harvard University Library (reel 1746).
=======
An exposition of al the principal Scriptures vsed in our English liturgie together with a reason why the church did chuse the same / by Iohn Boys ... Boys, John, 1571-1625.
[6], 126 p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by William Aspley, at the signe of the Parot in Pauls Churchyard, At London : 1610.
Signatures: A⁴(⁻A1) B-R⁴ (last leaf blank). Marginal notes. Error in paging: p. 89 misnumbered 86. Imperfect: copy at reel 1746:16 torn, with slight loss of print. In this edition, title page line 4 begins: PAL. Identified as STC 3456b at reel 587:7. Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 587) and Harvard University Library (reel 1746).
William Aspley
Felix Kyngston
the signe of the Parot in Pauls Churchyard
